actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Concurrent resolution recommending voluntary agreements between the Government and industry for the development of passive restraint systems in automobiles until these systems have been proven effective.

summary.text: Calls for a concerted effort to come to an agreement with industry on a plan to increase the use of passive restraint systems on the roads. Defers rulemaking with respect to passive restraints on the highways until they are proven to reduce deaths and injury.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution recommending voluntary agreements between the Government and industry for the development of passive restraint systems in automobiles until these systems have been proven effective.
